data.what_is:
"Hey Oliver" is a marketing automation tool that tracks and monitors each one of your website visitors, their behavior and browsing patterns in real-time. At the same time, it identifies potential clients by analyzing their behavior and transaction data and gets insights into what each customer is looking for or interested in.

With the help of our lead scoring algorithm, "Hey Oliver" can identify both positive and negative customers, nurture and process them with the use of a full suite of sophisticated tools. Website leads can get automated, personalized and engaged actions aiming to increase engagement, build trust with the company and help them progress along the sales funnel, fill in an enquiry form, contact the company or whatever the marketing strategy is.

"Hey Oliver" can run marketing campaigns to reach potential customers even if they are not browsing the website at the time, via inbound marketing, push notifications, email marketing and real time chat.

With Hey Oliver, you can create simple marketing campaigns such as a simple announcement, or more advanced campaigns based on criteria, for example, to reach a group of visitors with an offer who are at least 40% interested in a double bed room in London, with sea-view, coming from Germany in July.
data.product_description: Hey Oliver is a marketing automation solution designed to track and identify potential clients by analyzing their behavior and transaction data while browsing a website.

pricing_plans.plan_description: Talk with visitors on your website with live chat & offline messaging features, just without the price tag. Provide winning customer support in a lightning fast, reliable and scalable way even from your mobile phone. This is a non contract plan with no credit card check.

Our all-in-one marketing automation solution for websites with moderate number of visits, and administrators who are looking to convert visitors with our basic suite of tools.

Includes the action center, real time chat, engagement alerts, automated targeting, email marketing, analytics and lead management.

A complete, powerful, fully featured marketing automation solution for small and medium sized websites, who want to enjoy our full suite of product, services and cutting edge solutions.

All "Oliver Plus" features, plus advanced profiling and tracking, mass email, push notifications, multiple user roles, groups segmentation and contact lists.

Website with high demands? We got you covered! Enjoy advanced marketing automation, cross-domain (multi website) tracking and best-in-market tracking via your own custom tags.

All "Oliver Premium" features, plus cross domain tracking, unlimited actions and forms tracking, unlimited number of users, and increase in tools usage.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Hey Oliver?
With Hey Oliver we can track all visitors with accurate & real-time feedback. When we get track, then we can convert them into our customers because we have customer's interests and preferences. We can send them a personalized campaign.

What do you dislike about Hey Oliver?
Although it's not a major issue, but Social Media Monitoring feature is missing from their tool. Apart from this everything is great and it's best for small and new businesses.

What problems is Hey Oliver solving and how is that benefiting you?
With Hey Oliver we have the option to customize it with links to FAQ and more. I think all new and small businesses are actually looking for this feature, which helps them to solve support issues because it's very economically cheap compared to hiring multiple employees for the same.

initial_reviews.review_title: Automation that helps you help your business
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Hey Oliver?
This product revolves mainly around automation to help businesses grow. I like the aspect of getting daily analytics and overviews - all on a neat user friendly dashboard.

What do you dislike about Hey Oliver?
Customization is a bit complicated and limited in many aspects. You have to stick to the pre-defined features rather than being able to cater your own needs.

Recommendations to others considering Hey Oliver:
This is a great tool if you can figure out how to set it correctly for your business needs. This can help in automation and eventual business growth.

What problems is Hey Oliver solving and how is that benefiting you?
In this competitive landscape, getting business insights and using those towards business growth has become harder and more challenging. Hey Oliver helps businesses combat this can provides insights in the most simple and impactful manner, making decision making faster as well as efficient.

initial_reviews.review_title: Top software for business growth and generating new leads
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Hey Oliver?
I have used many automation software before, but Hey Oliver stands out amongst all others as it has helped me generate more leads than what we planned for and has boosted our conversion rate for the compaigns

What do you dislike about Hey Oliver?
It is a little bit expensive for startups in my opinion.

What problems is Hey Oliver solving and how is that benefiting you?
We were trying to run retargeting marketing campaigns and generate more leads, the automation tool has made us lead successful marketing lead generation campaigns. The most beneficial advantage of using Hey Oliver has been the analytics feature of the product

initial_reviews.review_content:

It has an easy interface so working with it is not hard at all. The graphics are simply beautiful its a time saver and you don't need to look for new campaign because it will inform you.

What do you dislike about Hey Oliver?
It doesn't have a social media marketing tool which i think would be useful. The social media marketing tool is not a major problem but it would be cool to have it. There is also no way to build a list from scratch.

What problems is Hey Oliver solving and how is that benefiting you?
The support is awesome. And they keep up up to date on canges so you don't have to go search for it your self.

Customer service experience is not the best, and it does not have a social media monitoring feature.

The best I like about Hey Oliver is it is used for the sales process like creating a lead and converting the lead to an opportunity, this entire sales process can be customizable.

What do you dislike about Hey Oliver?
The one thing I dislike is it doesn't have the complete sales package like we don't have the advance approvals in the package. I think this will be useful if we have that included too.

What problems is Hey Oliver solving and how is that benefiting you?
Personally, I was able to solve the sales process problems for converting the leads and creating the users in the system. The best part is it is less expensive than the CRM software packages.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Hey Oliver?
What I like most about this app is that it can be helpful for small businesses who do not have the capacity for 24/7 chat support, and it's easy to use. It also helps businesses track customers and convert them into recurring clients.

What do you dislike about Hey Oliver?
Customer service experience is not the best, and it does not have a social media monitoring feature.

What problems is Hey Oliver solving and how is that benefiting you?
I have no current issues that I am solving with this app, and the benefits I have realized benefits including a friendly interface--quick setup for campaigns to monitor everything.
